response.original_title: ゾンビキャットファイト ～死んでも闘う女性たち～[TMZ-01]
response.overview: In a certain location in the city, the resurrection experiment of Rin Yokoyama, who died in an accident, was successful. Rin is revived as a zombie. As a test, it is decided to have Zombie Rin fight against the skilled female fighter Ichigo Suzuya. Although Suzuya is hesitant, she takes on the challenge of fighting the zombie woman. Suzuya's diverse techniques are ineffective against Zombie Rin, who feels no pain, leading to exhaustion. Tired, Suzuya is bitten, screams, rolls her eyes back, and is killed. The deceased Suzuya is resurrected as a zombie, and the ultimate battle between female zombies begins. Two beautiful women, who died an unwilling death, become zombies and enter a fierce survival battle! A world of female zombies explodes, and one is sure to forget reality in the face of such an otherworldly fight.
response.tagline: A miraculous horror catfight that no one has ever seen is realized.
response.title: Zombie Catfight - Women Fighting to the Death [TMZ-01]
